description:
The wait is finally over!
No longer will you have to manually merge conflicting bin, bmd, pm1, bf and tbl files found in different mods.
This is the latest and greatest mod package manager, made specifically for Persona 4 Golden on PC, Persona 3 FES, Persona 5, and Persona 5 Strikers.
summary: The Mod package manager made specifically for Persona 4 Golden on PC, Persona 3 FES, Persona 5, and Persona 5 Strikers.
author: TekkaGB
